basic.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from HCV NS3 helicase protein)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.18479669]Hepatitis C virus (HCV):inhibition of HCV helicase activity(IC50=27.1±2.4 μM);West Nile virus (WNV):inhibition of WNV helicase activity(IC50=37.1±3.9 μM);Japanese encephalitis virus (JEV):inhibition of JEV helicase activity(IC50=49.8±4.3 μM).
